column4: Hey guys , I have ubuntu 8.10 running on amd 64 bit Turion , HP DV9700 , I have my nic working at 100mbit, but want to know if there is a gigabit driver avialable?
Not sure,  nvidia's nforce drivers come with the lan drivers..   dunno what they got for linux drivers or whatnot ,
it seems the driver being used is called  forcedeth
